elements.name: Display and accept a standard alert

steps.name: the user navigates to the Alerts section
they trigger a simple alert popup
an alert appears with text "You clicked a button"
the user navigates to the Alerts section
they activate the confirm alert and press Cancel
the result area shows "You selected Cancel"
the user navigates to the Alerts section
they activate the confirm alert and press OK
the result area shows "You selected Ok"

elements.name: Enter text into a prompt alert

steps.name: the user navigates to the Alerts section
the prompt alert is shown and they input "Playwright"
the page displays prompt result containing "You entered Playwright"
the user navigates to the Alerts section
they click the delayed alert button and accept it
an alert appears with text "This alert appeared after 5 seconds"

name: Interaction with various types of alerts

description:
As a user,
  I want to be able to select checkboxes
  So that I can choose multiple options

steps.name: I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select a random checkbox
the selected checkbox should be checked
I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select the "Desktop" checkbox
the "Desktop" checkbox should be checked
I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select the "Documents" checkbox
the "Documents" checkbox should be checked
I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select the "Downloads" checkbox
the "Downloads" checkbox should be checked
I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select the "Office" checkbox
the "Office" checkbox should be checked
I am on the "checkbox" page
I expand all checkboxes
I select the "WorkSpace" checkbox
the "WorkSpace" checkbox should be checked

name: Checkbox Selection

description:
As a user
  I want to be able to select dates
  So that I can input date information

steps.name: I am on the "date picker" page
I select a random future date
the selected date should be displayed in the correct format

name: Date Picker

description:
As a user
  I want to be able to drag and drop elements
  So that I can rearrange content on the page

elements.name: Dragging an element to a drop target

steps.name: I am on the "drag and drop" page
I drag the element to the drop target
the element should be dropped successfully

name: Drag and Drop

description:
As a user
  I want to be able to select radio buttons
  So that I can choose a single option from a set

steps.name: I am on the "radio button" page
I select the "Yes" radio button
the text "Yes" should be displayed in the result
I am on the "radio button" page
I select the "Impressive" radio button
the text "Impressive" should be displayed in the result

name: Radio Buttons

description:
As a user
  I want to be able to adjust a slider
  So that I can select values within a range

elements.name: Moving the slider to a random value

steps.name: I am on the "slider" page
I move the slider to a random value
the slider value should be within the expected range

name: Slider

elements.name: Successful form submission with valid data

steps.name: I open the form page
I fill the form with:
I submit the form
I should see the submission modal with:

elements.name: Choosing different options from all dropdown menus

steps.name: I open the select menu webpage
I pick "Group 2, option 1" from the "Select Value" dropdown
I choose "Other" from the "Select One" dropdown
I select "Green" in the old-style dropdown menu
I pick multiple colors: "Black" and "Blue"
the selected colors should include "Black" and "Blue"

name: Interacting with Select Menus on the DemoQA page

elements.name: User fills out the text box with random information

steps.name: the user navigates to the text box form
the user inputs randomly generated form data
submits the completed form
the form output should match the entered values

name: Filling out the text box form

steps.name: I am on the tool tips page
I hover over the element with selector "#toolTipButton"
I should see the tooltip text "You hovered over the Button"

elements.name: Check text on Text Field tooltip

steps.name: I am on the tool tips page
I hover over the element with selector "#toolTipTextField"
I should see the tooltip text "You hovered over the text field"
I am on the tool tips page
I hover over the element with text "Contrary"
I should see the tooltip text "You hovered over the Contrary"
I am on the tool tips page
I hover over the element with text "1.10.32"
I should see the tooltip text "You hovered over the 1.10.32"
